text: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ بِٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُهۡلِكُوٓاْ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِۖ إِنَّ أَهۡلَهَا كَانُواْ ظَٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: And when Our messengers came to Abraham with the good tidings, they said, "Indeed, we will destroy the people of that Lot's city. Indeed, its people have been wrongdoers
translation.id: Dan ketika utusan Kami (para malaikat) datang kepada Ibrahim dengan membawa kabar gembira,623) mereka mengatakan, "Sungguh, kami akan membinasakan penduduk kota (Sodom) ini karena penduduknya sungguh orang-orang zalim
